Description.Text: Grande Amore Hotel and Spa is a classic 4-star superior property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Florence. Highlights include a spa, free Wi-Fi and a good location near the Museo di San Marco. San Marco is a notable church and convent in the northeast of the city centre. Nearby places of interest include the Museo di San Marco, Piazza della Liberta and the Accademia Gallery, which houses Michelangelo's David. There are several bus stops located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Florence destinations. The hotel is housed in a classic mid-rise building on a small street. Facilities include a spa with a sauna, steam room and Jacuzzi. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Amore Executive rooms are approximately 23sqm and decorated in a cosy style with dark wood furniture, contrasting tones and elegant lighting. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower and exclusive complimentary toiletries. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the Lounge Bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
